game.name: Gemmy's Adventure
game.shortDescription: Simple but not easy! Gemmy's Adventure is a casual action game. All you need to do is move a mouse to reach the finish line without touching any traps, objects and walls. Levels get harder, requiring strategy to pass.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Simple but not easy! Gemmy's Adventure is a casual action game. All you need to do is move a mouse to reach the finish line without touching any traps, objects and walls. Levels get harder, requiring strategy to pass.
